body:
@Osmose re: the addon listener - so the way undo works in `about:addons` is that it does not actually commit the change until you navigate away, at which point it calls `uninstall()` on the add-on (and any other pending changes).

An easy way to test if this is what you're seeing would be to reload `about:addons` after clicking "Remove".
